member.name: T:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.ApplicationViewScaling
member.summary: Provides methods and properties for controlling layout scaling.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.ApplicationViewScaling.DisableLayoutScaling
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether layout scaling is disabled.
member.returns: **true** if layout scaling is disabled; otherwise, **false**.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.ViewManagement.ApplicationViewScaling.TrySetDisableLayoutScaling(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to set the DisableLayoutScaling property to the specified value.
member.param: **true** to disable layout scaling; **false** to enable it.
member.returns: **true** if the property was set successfully; otherwise, **false**.
